entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as a person who might have thrown away the locket. She is described as evil.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who heard Unspeakables complaining about the Floo Network.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who overheard a conversation that helped them locate Umbridge's office.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the narrator and is mentioned as a person who knows important information.

entities.name: locket
entities.description: The locket is mentioned as an object that might have been thrown away by Umbridge.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as a location where Apparition has been stopped.

entities.name: floo_network
entities.description: Floo Network is mentioned as a system that only senior Ministry members are allowed to use.

entities.name: unspeakables
entities.description: The Unspeakables are mentioned as a group of people who complained about the Floo Network.

entities.name: dolores
entities.description: Dolores is mentioned as a person whose office is located on level one.

relationships.description: Harry suggests that Umbridge might have found a way to open the locket and become possessed.
Ron heard Unspeakables complaining about the Floo Network.
